name: YouTube Audio Downloader
short_description:
Example use:

$ cat list.txt
1kIa5fiv1qY 2013-08-29 Gregg Troy on The Morning Swim Show
OkcyJBUW_40 2013-08-28 Bob Needham on The Morning Swim Show

$ youtube-audio-dl list.txt
+ 1kIa5fiv1qY 2013-08-29 Gregg Troy on The Morning Swim Show
[youtube] Setting language
...
[ffmpeg] Destination: 1kIa5fiv1qY.mp3
+ OkcyJBUW_40 2013-08-28 Bob Needham on The Morning Swim Show
[youtube] Setting language
...
[ffmpeg] Destination: OkcyJBUW_40.mp3

$ ls
2013-08-29 Gregg Troy on The Morning Swim Show.mp3
2013-08-28 Bob Needham on The Morning Swim Show
summary: Download and convert YouTube videos to audio
